name: AI & Machine Learning
description: From neural networks to LLMs. Master Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch to build intelligent systems of the future.

name: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking
description: Become a digital defender. Learn penetration testing, network security, and cryptography to protect against modern threats.

name: Cloud Native & DevOps
description: Architect scalable systems. Dive into AWS/GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines for modern infrastructure.

name: Data Science & Analytics
description: Turn raw data into actionable insights. Explore data analysis, visualization, statistical modeling, and big data technologies.

name: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Build complete web apps from server to screen. Master JavaScript, React, Node.js, and modern database technologies.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Create applications for billions of users. Learn Swift for iOS or Kotlin for Android and build the next big app.

name: Game Development & Design
description: Bring virtual worlds to life. Master game engines like Unity or Unreal, C#, and the principles of interactive design.

name: Blockchain & Web3
description: Explore the decentralized future. Understand cryptocurrencies, smart contracts, and build DApps on the blockchain.
